titleStmt.title: The parsons guide: or The lavv of tithes. Wherein is shewed, who must pay tythes, and to whom, and of what things, when, and how they must be paid, and how they may be recovered at this day, and how a man may be discharged of payment thereof. By W.S. Esq;
titleStmt.author: Sheppard, William, d. 1675?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Lee, D. Pakeman, and G. Bedell, at their shops in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
